summary: TRANSMISSION FAILED AFTER ONLY 65,000 MILES.  HAD TO BE TOTALLY REBUILT AT COST OF $3,000.  IMMEDIATELY AFTERWARDS, ALL FOUR MOTOR MOUNTS FAILED.  VERY ANGRY AND FRUSTRATED.  NO ONE CAN JUSTIFY WHY THE CAR WAS RUNNING FINE WITHOUT A SINGLE NOISE ONE DAY AND THEN THE TRANSMISSION AND THEN ENGINE MOUNTS WOULD FAIL WITHOUT WARNING.  *JB
